DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate safety efficacy BOTOX® ( botulinum toxin Type A ) treatment upper facial line ( Crow 's Feet Lines Frown Lines ) .
DOC.brief_title: BOTOX® Treatment Upper Facial Lines Japan
DOC.criteria: Moderate severe Crow 's Feet Lines Frown Lines Current previous botulinum toxin treatment serotype Diagnosis Myasthenia gravis , EatonLambert Syndrome , Amyotrophic Lateral Sclerosis Facial laser light treatment cosmetic purpose , microdermabrasion , superficial peel , topical retinoid therapy hormone cream within 3 month Laser treatment phototherapy face medical purpose , blepharoplasty , browlift related procedure , periorbital permanent makeup , oral retinoid therapy within one year Mediumdepth deep facial peel within 5 year Prior facial cosmetic surgery ( e.g. , prior periorbital surgery , facial lift , periorbital treatment filler , implantation transplantation )
